attributes.action: Let people buy TAX without MOT in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: Let people buy tax as long as MOT is booked or anytime they have to buy it.
attributes.background: You can not buy car TAX in Northern Ireland without valid MOT. The problem is huge backlog in all MOT centres country wide, so while people are OK to drive their cars as long as they are roadworthy and MOT is booked, they can not buy TAX. Having no tax is an offence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Northern Ireland Executive and Northern Ireland Assembly.  You might want to contact your MLA following the conclusion of the ongoing election in Northern Ireland.
